parameters.name: FeatMgrViewPane
parameters.description: FeatureManager design tree view as defined by swFeatMgrPane_e

title: IModelViewManager.GetFeatureMgrViewHWnd
description: Gets the window handle for the specified FeatureManager design tree view.

parameters.name: FeatMgrViewPane
parameters.description: FeatureManager design tree view as defined by swFeatMgrPane_e

returns: Window handle for the specified FeatMgrViewPane
remarks:
If your application must be x64 compatible, then use
IModelViewManager::GetFeatureMgrViewHWndx64
.
